component.name: Pyskool
component.summary: Remake of Skool Daze and Back to Skool

description.p: Pyskool is a faithful re-implementation of the classic ZX Spectrum games Skool Daze and Back to Skool.

Each game revolves around the antics of Eric, the hero. In Skool Daze, Eric must steal his report card from the school safe - the combination of which must be extracted from the teachers' brains using flashing shields or, in the case of the history teacher, post-hypnotic suggestion. In Back to Skool, Eric must get his report card back into the school safe, this time with the extra help provided by a water pistol, stinkbombs, a bike, mice, a frog and a girlfriend.
